comment._content: Love the ship, wish you had one of the "Herald of the Morning" around 1858...love to see what it looked like... Cheers

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/61769191@N05] @ Charlotte1858 - a Google search for "Herald of the Morning Sailing Ship" produced several webpages and images such as this - www.unicover.com/EF4UH23T.HTM . Good luck finding a photograph.
